column4: can someone tell me the release date of 5.10, im lookin foward to it and would like to know in advance.
will 5.10 have better ati support?? will it be shipping with PRESETUP drivers that are up to date?? do any of you know
yeah, im just hoping that ati works easier. i want to get dual monitors i finaly learnt how xorg.conf works but it wasnt working for some reason. hopefully with 5.10 ill get dual monitors :D
